segments.advisor_message: I think it would be a good idea to take a closer look at your monthly expenses. Items like your groceries or utilities can impact your overall budget significantly. Have you thought about categorizing those expenses?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I mean, I get that, but I dunno, sometimes it feels like those categories just make things um, more complicated. Like, do I really need to track every little thing?

segments.advisor_message: Tracking them can actually help you see where you might cut back, maybe on discretionary expenses like eating out or entertainment.
segments.client_message: Right, but it kinda sounds like a lot of work to me. Like, I already have things like the mortgage and car insurance to worry about, ya know? How much would that help anyway?
